gw.api.webservice.workflow

Class WorkflowAPIImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.workflow.WorkflowAPIImpl

  • public class WorkflowAPIImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Operations on workflows.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkflowAPIImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete(java.lang.String workflowID)
      Sets the state of the workflow with public ID workflowID to WorkflowState#TC_COMPLETED.
      void invokeTrigger(java.lang.String workflowID, WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)
      Invokes the triggerKey on the current step of the specified workflow causing the workflow to advance to the next step.
      boolean isTriggerAvailable(java.lang.String workflowID, WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)
      True if the given trigger is available in the Workflow; i.e. if it is OK to pass the trigger ID to the invokeTrigger method.
      void logTraceMsg(java.lang.String msg)
      Log a trace message to the service workflow category logger.
      void resumeAllWorkflows()
      Resumes all workflows in the state WorkflowState#TC_ERROR or WorkflowState#TC_SUSPENDED.
      void resumeWorkflow(java.lang.String workflowID)
      Resumes the workflow with public ID workflowID.
      void suspend(java.lang.String workflowID)
      Suspends the workflow with public ID workflowID.

    • Method Detail

      • complete

        public void complete(java.lang.String workflowID)
              throws SOAPException,
                     com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException,
                     com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException
        Sets the state of the workflow with public ID workflowID to WorkflowState#TC_COMPLETED. The workflow must be TC_ACTIVE.
        Parameters:
        workflowID - the public id of the workflow
        Throws:
        SOAPException - soap specific exceptions
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException - If the workflow id did not match a valid workflow.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException - If the workflow id is null.
        EntityStateException - If the workflow is in an invalidate state to complet

      • suspend

        public void suspend(java.lang.String workflowID)
             throws SOAPException
        Suspends the workflow with public ID workflowID. The workflow must be active
        Parameters:
        workflowID - the public id of the workflow
        Throws:
        SOAPException - soap specific exceptions
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException - If the workflow id did not match a valid workflow.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException - If the workflow id is null
        EntityStateException - if the workflow is not active

      • resumeWorkflow

        public void resumeWorkflow(java.lang.String workflowID)
                    throws SOAPException,
                           com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException,
                           com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException
        Resumes the workflow with public ID workflowID. The workflow engine will subsequently attempt to advance the workflow to its next step. If an error occurs again, the error will be logged and the workflow's state set to WorkflowState#TC_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        workflowID - the public id of the workflow
        Throws:
        SOAPException - soap specific exceptions
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException - if the workflow id did not match a valid workflow.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException - if the workflow id is null
        EntityStateException - if the workflow is not currently in the error or suspended state.

      • resumeAllWorkflows

        public void resumeAllWorkflows()
        Resumes all workflows in the state WorkflowState#TC_ERROR or WorkflowState#TC_SUSPENDED. The workflow engine will subsequently attempt to advance these workflows to their next steps. For each one, if an error occurs again, the error will be logged and the workflow's state set to WorkflowState#TC_ERROR.

      • invokeTrigger

        public void invokeTrigger(java.lang.String workflowID,
                 WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)
                   throws SOAPException,
                          com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException,
                          com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException
        Invokes the triggerKey on the current step of the specified workflow causing the workflow to advance to the next step. If a null or invalid workflow ID is passed in, an exception will be thrown. In addition, if the triggerkey is null or the trigger is not available, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        workflowID - The ID of the workflow this may not be null.
        triggerKey - A workflow trigger key off the current workflow
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException - if the workflow id did not match a valid workflow.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException - if the workflowID or triggerKey are null.
        SOAPException - if trigger unavailable or other soap specific exceptions

      • isTriggerAvailable

        public boolean isTriggerAvailable(java.lang.String workflowID,
                         WorkflowTriggerKey triggerKey)
                           throws SOAPException,
                                  com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException,
                                  com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException
        True if the given trigger is available in the Workflow; i.e. if it is OK to pass the trigger ID to the invokeTrigger method.
        Parameters:
        workflowID - The ID of the workflow this may not be null.
        triggerKey - A workflow trigger key off the current workflow
        Returns:
        true if the trigger is avialable, false otherwise
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLBadIdentifierException - if the workflow id did not match a valid workflow.
        com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLRequiredFieldException - if the workflowID or triggerKey are null.
        SOAPException - for other soap specific exceptions

      • logTraceMsg

        public void logTraceMsg(java.lang.String msg)
        Log a trace message to the service workflow category logger.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to log
